sources.title: Love, the Italian Way (1960) Belinda Lee, Walter Chiari | Romance Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
A group of passengers traveling around the Mediterranean on a luxury liner enjoy various adventures and become romantically involved with each other.  You Don't Have to be Italian to See It or Enjoy It!

Original title: Femmine di lusso / Intrigo a Taormina (1960) 

Director: Giorgio Bianchi
Writers: Oreste Biancoli, Roberto Gianviti, Vittorio Metz
Stars: Belinda Lee, Walter Chiari, Ugo Tognazzi
Genres: Italian cinema, Comedy, Romance

Members-only videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
